subject: Hello, I’m asking what setup of springs/elastomers do you recommend on my pro plus pedals for gt3 car.

conversations.body_text: Hi SpiXiQ,     ​You can upgrade to our latest damping and hydraulic kit, which provides more precise tuning with the damper adjustments and shim combinations, significantly enhancing the overall pedal feel.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit

Im planning to but what can I do with the things I have

On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 04:29 support@simsonn.com
Hi SpiXiQ,  You may refer to Combination 4 as a reference—reducing the number of damping units can help lower the overall resistance and shorten the pedal travel.
